analysis.key_quote: This rule risks undermining the merit-based principles of the civil service by allowing career positions to be reclassified as policy-influencing, potentially stripping employees of long-established due process protections.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses serious concerns about the proposed rule undermining merit-based principles and due process protections, indicating a clear opposition to the rule. Additionally, it highlights risks of politicization and loss of institutional knowledge, further aligning with an anti-politicization stance.
